problem.p: How many distinct solutions (mirrored solutions are considered to be different) will there be to the N-Queen problem ...
if N is equal to 3? (Please enter an integer)
if N is equal to 4? (Please enter an integer)
if N is equal to 5? (Please enter an integer)
if N is equal to 6? (Please enter an integer)
if N is equal to 7? (Please enter an integer)

div.p: You may refer to the Wikipedia page on Eight queens puzzle for counting the solutions.
You may also run the BlueJ demo program we provided to verify the solutions.
